name: DR. NIKHIL MARRIWALA
description: The Training and Placement department helps students get jobs at big businesses by working with their academic departments. We are thankful that many organizations trust us and hope we can continue working together in a good way.

name: DR. SANJEEV AHUJA
description: The Dpt. of Training and Placement facilitates the placement of students in leading industrial enterprises. We express our gratitude to the respective organizations for their trust and confidence in our services, and look forward to fostering a strong relationship with them.

name: DR. SUNIL DHINGRA
description: The Department of Training and Placement helps students get placed in top industrial establishments. We thank organizations for trusting us and hope to maintain a strong relationship with them.
